title: Board game Azul
descriptions:
Azul – a relaxing, colorful board game for 2 to 4 players.

- What it is: A friendly, easy-to-learn game where you place beautiful patterned tiles to decorate a palace wall.
- Who can play: Great for grandparents, grandkids, and friends. Best with 2–4 players.
- How long it takes: Most games finish in about 30–45 minutes.
- How it feels: Calm, thoughtful, and satisfying. No reading is required once someone explains the simple rules.
- What you do: Take tiles from the center, arrange them on your board, and score points for matching colors and making neat patterns. Each turn is short and clear.
- Why it’s nice for seniors:
  - Large, sturdy tiles that are easy to see and pick up.
  - Simple choices each turn—no complicated math.
  - Bright colors and clear designs help keep track of your pieces.
  - You can pause between turns and chat. It’s gentle and social.

Details:
- Brand: Next Move
- Theme: Patterns and color matching
- Players: 2–4
- Designer: Michael Riesling
- Quality: High-quality components for long-lasting play
- Material: Durable paperboard with smooth, tactile tiles

Azul is a calm, beautiful game that brings people together. Set it on the table, enjoy the colors, make lovely patterns, and share a pleasant time with the people you love. Perfect for family nights, afternoon tea, or a quiet evening at home.
